post.text: With 15 days to go, Hillary and Elizabeth Warren hit the trail in New Hampshire. Join them: IWillVote.com

comment.author: Tyler
comment.text: Hillary is a liar! Raising my daughter to be honest. Don't vote for a person who turns her head when she's responsible for a death of a soldier.

replies.author: Tristan
replies.text: Seriously?? You want your daughter to accept a man like Donald Trump to run HER life?? I sure don't want my daughter to view all the Donald's of the world as acceptable!

replies.author: Geffery
replies.text: If you're serious about teaching your daughter to tell the truth don't start with Hillary start with yourself!!!

replies.author: Tristan
replies.text: Geffery I do, thanks! I'm a very honest, trustworthy individual. Donald Trump is a textbook narcissist! Look up NPD on the DSM...he fits it perfectly! I don't want my daughter thinking men like him are normal, or acceptable. "People" like him are not! And should not run our country! It's that simple. If you feel differently, so be it. I won't judge you...that's the type of person I am and the type of daughter and sons I'm raising.
